summary: A band of runaways and orphans of the war scour the countryside in search of food and shelter. They invade and then taken in by a musician and former concert pianist who's hiding out in a ... See full summary »
cast: Artúr Somlay|Miklós Gábor|Zsuzsa Bánki|György Bárdy|László Horváth|István Rozsos|László Kemény|Abraham Ronai|György Bodó|Károly Bicskey|András Tollas|Endre Harkányi
director: Director: Géza von Radványi (as Géza Radványi)
title: Valahol Európában
